name: Bud's Toaster Quest
description:
Hello, I am ToasterPower, and this is my very stupid platformer.

Story:

Your name is Bud Han, and you go to buy cat food. On the way to the store though, you get distracted by a hobo who sends you on a mission to find the magical toaster fragments. What can go wrong?

Some screenshots:

pain flying spikeballs why wth boioioing

Bobo The Hobo's alleyway Chomp Munch Crunch mmmmmm yeah yummy uhhh

FAQ
Q:What engine does it run on?

A:GDevelop

Q:What did you use for the sprites?

A:Aseprite
